data_table.description: Hip Shape Modes (HSM) Derived from DXA Scan Using Active Shape Modeling, Original Cohort Exam 22 (mostly) and Offspring Cohort Exams 6, 7.

variable.name: shareid
variable.coll_interval: Test Performed at Original Cohort Exam 22 (mostly) and Offspring Cohort Exams 6,

variable.coll_interval: Test Performed at Original Cohort Exam 22 (mostly) and Offspring Cohort Exams 6,
